CustomField.description: For each pattern match, it returns the corresponding color as the label for the container. For example, if the "Shipping Country" is "UAE", the formula will return "Green" as the container label color.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-assigned color label based on destination country. UAE ➜ Green, KG ➜ Red, KZ ➜ Light Blue. If destination is not matched, color will be "Unknown."
CustomField.label: Container Label Color
